courseSectionInformation: 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in the Department of Speech and Hearing Science.
description: Focuses on current cochlear implant technologies, principles of evidence-based practice of cochlear implant assessment and intervention by audiologists and speech-language pathologists, and empirical outcomes for children and adults. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in the Department of Speech and Hearing Science.
label: Cochlear Implants
